description:
The svalbard heavy duty Shorts are durable outdoor shorts made to withstand rough days in rough terrain. These shorts are made in a below-the-knee length in a strong organic cotton/ recycled polyester fabric – securing great protection and comfort. Both seat and knees are protected with water resistant material for extra weather protection.

The shorts offer details like full thigh venting, practical pockets and a Custom-Fit Waist system™. A little wear and tear never scared off these classics and they’re the number one choice if you’re in need of some long lasting, workwear inspired shorts.
name: Norrona Svalbard Heavy Duty Shorts - Mens
